items.name: Project Security Guard
items.description: Project-scoped security hook that blocks dangerous Bash commands and sensitive file access while auto-approving safe dev workflows.
items.longDescription: Project-scoped PreToolUse hook that blocks dangerous Bash commands (rm outside project, force push, DROP TABLE, terraform destroy, docker prune, eval, network exfiltration) and sensitive file access, while auto-approving safe dev workflow commands and remembering granted permissions.

items.name: Universal Security Guard
items.description: User-scoped security hook that blocks universally dangerous operations like reverse shells, privilege escalation, and credential access across all projects.
items.longDescription: User-scoped PreToolUse hook that blocks universally dangerous operations across all projects: reverse shells, sudo/privilege escalation, credential file reads, keychain access, persistence mechanisms (crontab, launchctl, systemd), library injection, container escapes, and git config attacks. Never auto-approves -- only denies threats and defers safe commands to normal permission flow.
